\N<Alex>Any chance I could follow along for a while?
Would you like to read it?
Some alignments are strong against other alignments.
For example, Keepers do more damage to Jokers.
When an alignment has an advantage over another one,
all of their attacks to 33% more damage!
When an alignment is weak to another one, their attacks
will not be weakened, they only take more damage.
